author: nxr
title: Rapid Funding with ML Voting Agents
description: Multiple objectives and broad-community voting make it hard to quickly provide funding to urgent projects while ensuring their quality.
solution: A rapid-funding process with weekly awards, a simpler pipeline, ML voting agents to reduce voting workload, and human approval of decisions.
experience: 15+ years of building big-data and ML products for a russian search engine Yandex, a vacation-rentals search engine HomeToGo, and Uber.
